summary: A Prime Day deal will get you half-off an order from Grubhub, so long as you're a Grubhub+ member, which you should be if you have Amazon Prime.

title: California police department buys Cybertruck to keep kids off drugs
content: An Orange County, California town bought a tricked-out Cybertruck to be a part of its D.A.R.E. program.
summary: An Orange County, California town bought a tricked-out Cybertruck to be a part of its D.A.R.E. program.

title: Hurricane Milton live cams: See Tampa Bay webcams as landfall nears
content: Hurricane Milton has intensified into a major hurricane and is projected to make landfall on the west coast of the Florida Peninsula around the Tampa Bay region. Livestreaming webcams show the impacts.
summary: Hurricane Milton has intensified into a major hurricane and is projected to make landfall on the west coast of the Florida Peninsula around the Tampa Bay region. Livestreaming webcams show the impacts.

title: I've tested the Dyson Airwrap, and this Prime Day Airwrap deal is worth getting
content: As Mashable's shopping beauty tech reporter, I only recommend the Dyson Airwrap when it's on sale — and for Prime Day, it's down to $499.99.
summary: As Mashable's shopping beauty tech reporter, I only recommend the Dyson Airwrap when it's on sale — and for Prime Day, it's down to $499.99.

title: Amazon Prime Day gaming laptop deals: Alienware M16 R2 and Acer Nitro V at record lows
content: In terms of gaming laptop deals, the second day of Prime Big Deal Days sees record-low pricing on the Acer Nitro V and Alienware M16 and M18.

title: Amazon Prime Day Book deals: Score Kindle books, paperbacks, and hardcovers
content: You can score up to 80% off Kindle ebooks and up to 50% off hardback and paperback titles on October Prime Day 2024.

title: At 20% off, the Ninja Creami is worth starting an ice cream shop for
content: The TikTok sensation, Ninja Creami, is on sale during Prime Big Deal Days. We've tested it and had a lot of fun, and you can, too, with this deal.

title: I’m a home baker and these are the deals worth buying for your kitchen this Prime Day
content: From basic bakeware to KitchenAid stand mixers, these are the best deals for home bakers to shop during Amazon's October Prime Big Deal Days.
